channel.title: Mafia Wars(FaceBook App)
channel.description:
[color=brown][color=yellow]hey people
you probably heard of Mafia Wars
Text based game that is taking over the net!
I thought it will be cool if we make a Mob of Moparscape
Join Mafia: http://apps.facebook.com/inthemafia/status_invite.php?from=1166624646
this is the link to Mafia
you will be in my team and I will be in yours[/color][/color]
PS.
you have to have face book to play.

item.title: Mafia Wars(FaceBook App)
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

There is a clan board on mitb, use that instead.

Read full topic
